alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 9:27PM EST until January 14 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water floods lowlands along the Still River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 11.0 feet late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Sat 8 pm: 12.4 Forecast: Sat 9 pm MSG Sun 3 am 12.2 Sun 9 am 11.6 Sun 3 pm 11.1 Sun 9 pm 11.0 Mon 3 am MSG Mon 9 am MSG Mon 3 pm MSG Mon 9 pm MSG Tue 3 am MSG Tue 9 am MSG Tue 3 pm MSG &&
